message.name: ERR_CREATELINK_XRV_LINK_EXISTS_FOR_SERVICE_DELIVERY_AND_RELATED_RECORD
message.locale: A Service Delivery Link already exists to this Service Delivery for this record.

message.name: ERR_CREATELINK_FV_RELATED_ID_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A related ID must be entered for the Service Delivery link.

message.name: ERR_CREATELINK_FV_RELATED_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A related type must be entered for the Service Delivery link.

message.name: ERR_CREATELINK_FV_SERVICE_DELIVERY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A Service Delivery must be entered for the Service Delivery Link.

message.name: ERR_CREATELINK_XRV_TYPE_PARTICIPANT_CANCELLED
message.locale: A Service Delivery link cannot be created for a canceled Case Participant Role.
A Service Delivery link cannot be created for a cancelled Case Participant Role.

message.name: ERR_CREATELINK_XRV_SERVICE_DELIVERY_CANCELLED
message.locale: A Service Delivery link cannot be created on a canceled Service Delivery.
A Service Delivery link cannot be created on a cancelled Service Delivery.
